Name: iterate_and_print_steps
Input 1: A script to iterate numbers from 1 up to an input variable value, printing each number with a prefix 'Step: ' on separate lines.

Name: print_steps
Input 1: A script to iterate from 1 to a user-inputted number, printing each step with a prefix 'Step: '.

Name: display_steps
Input 1: A script to iterate from 1 to a user-defined number, formatting the output with a prefix for each iteration.

Name: generate_steps
Input 1: A Python script that dynamically generates a series of steps based on a user-defined input, iterating from 1 up to a specified number and printing each step in sequence with the iteration number prefixed by "Step:".

Name: print_iteration_steps
Input 1: A script to dynamically iterate from 1 up to a user-specified number, printing each step.
